help: The timezone for localizing dates and times in the application. This is an IANA timezone identifier (e.g. America/New_York). If null, dates and times are localized to the user's local timezone.
The time-to-live (TTL) for data cached at the edge, in milliseconds.
Whether to hide the announcements link in the main menu when there are no announcements.
Whether to show an invitation for users to submit feedback.
The name of the Bootstrap Icons icon to show next to the feedback link, without the `bi-` prefix.
The title text for the feedback link.
The subtitle text for the feedback link.
The target URL for the feedback link.
The Postgres host for the configuration database.
The Postgres port for the configuration database.
The Postgres database name for the configuration database.
The Postgres user for the configuration database.
The Postgres password for the configuration database.
Whether to use a custom app icon instead of the default icon.
The asset name of the app favicon.
The asset name of the app icon in the OpenGraph metadata.
The IANA media type of the app icon in the OpenGraph metadata.
The alt text of the app icon in the OpenGraph metadata.
A short name for the app when installed as a PWA.
The background color in the PWA manifest.
The asset name of the app icon in the PWA manifest (any).
The IANA media type of the app icon in the PWA manifest (any).
The dimensions of the app icon in the PWA manifest (any).
The asset name of the app icon in the PWA manifest (maskable).
The IANA media type of the app icon in the PWA manifest (maskable).
The dimensions of the app icon in the PWA manifest (maskable).
